channel.title: How to Make objects tele you.. and make objects
channel.description:
[b]hello, i have recen;lty seen lot's of threads like: how i make portals tele me?? etc so i have made this thread.
Difficulty: 3/10
Assumed Knowledge: a Brain.. if you have one..
Classes Modified: , Client.Java
first of all
[u]MAKING OBJECTS[/u] [/b]
Look in Client.Java for something like this..
[code]makeGlobalObject(3690, 3471, 3206, -1, 10);//Barrel[/code] i think this is cxoded on my server and i highly doubt you have the same barrel id and co-ords so just do makeglobalobject.. so under that if i wanted a hay bale for Example i'd type: [code]makeGlobalObject(XCORD, YCORD, OBJECTID, -1, 10);//OBJECT NAME[/code]
Exit, Compile.. Then their is a w/e object their.. Hope it helps ~~
[b][u]MAKING SPAWNED OBJECTS TELE YOU.[/u]
Classes Modified : Client.Java
Assumed Knowledge : half a brain O.O
Difficulty 1/10
Ok, look in ur Client.Java for something like this..
[code]case WHATTELESYOU? E.G PREACH FROM HOLY BOOK THE ID OF BOOK..: sendMessage("WHAT IT SAYS AFTER YOU HAVE BEEN TELED."); teleportToX = CO-ORD; teleportToY = CO-ORD; heightLevel = 0; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; break; [/code]
Copy and Paste a Code like this But at the Start of the command it says case then the object ID:
so like [code]case E.G A Portal id which you made Earlier..[/code]
I hope you now enjoy Adding Objects! and teleing!
=D
Creds : me.. i just made this guide i know prob loads have been made this is one of the top of my head though, nice comments please, no bad ones :)
Thx ~~~Pk F0r M3 ~~~~~
[/b]

item.title: How to Make objects tele you.. and make objects
item.dc:creator: @ebaums_world ebaums world
item.description:
@ebaums_world wrote:

-Legend-:

O well, you didn’t use Add either, only used make way.

And if the source doesnt already have the voids added in, you would need to add them. So this wouldnt work about 70% of the time.

Read full topic
item.source: How to Make objects tele you.. and make objects

item.title: How to Make objects tele you.. and make objects
item.dc:creator: @pk_for_me pk for me
item.description:
@pk_for_me wrote:

[b]hello, i have recen;lty seen lot’s of threads like: how i make portals tele me?? etc
so i have made this thread.

Difficulty: 3/10

Assumed Knowledge: a Brain… if you have one…

Classes Modified: , Client.Java

first of all

MAKING OBJECTS [/b]

Look in Client.Java for something like this…

makeGlobalObject(3690, 3471, 3206, -1, 10);//Barrel

i think this is cxoded on my server and i highly doubt you have the same barrel id and co-ords so just do makeglobalobject…
so under that if i wanted a hay bale for Example i’d type:

makeGlobalObject(XCORD, YCORD, OBJECTID, -1, 10);//OBJECT NAME

Exit, Compile… Then their is a w/e object their…
Hope it helps ~~

[b]MAKING SPAWNED OBJECTS TELE YOU.

Classes Modified : Client.Java

Assumed Knowledge : half a brain O.O

Difficulty 1/10

Ok, look in ur Client.Java for something like this…

case WHATTELESYOU? E.G PREACH FROM HOLY BOOK THE ID OF BOOK..: sendMessage("WHAT IT SAYS AFTER YOU HAVE BEEN TELED."); teleportToX = CO-ORD; teleportToY = CO-ORD; heightLevel = 0; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; break;

Copy and Paste a Code like this But at the Start of the command it says case then the object ID:

so like case E.G A Portal id which you made Earlier..

I hope you now enjoy Adding Objects!
and teleing!

=D

Creds : me…
i just made this guide i know prob loads have been made this is one of the top of my head though, nice comments please, no bad ones

Thx ~~~Pk F0r M3 ~~~~~

[/b]

Read full topic
